West_Palm_Beach.Palm Beach Outlets: Palm Beach Outlets is a 440,000 square foot outlet shopping center in West Palm Beach, Florida. Opened on February 14, 2014, it was developed on the site of the former Palm Beach Mall. Palm Beach Outlets features over 100 stores including Saks Fifth Avenue OFF 5TH, Ann Taylor, Banana Republic, Brooks Brothers, J.Crew, Kenneth Cole, Nike, Tommy Hilfiger, Under Armour, and Vera Bradley.
